info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 08 at 3:22PM EDT until April 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY...ROBUST WINDS...AND HIGH ERC VALUES FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 068...071...072...073... 074... 075...163...166...167...168...170...172...173...174... 263... 266...267...270 AND 370... * Affected area...fire weather zones 068...071...072...073... 074...075...163...166...167...168...170...172...173...174... 263...266...267...270 and 370. * Wind...15 to 20 mph with higher gusts. * Humidity...Minimum values of 25 to 35 percent. * ERC...27 to 33. * Impacts...any fires that develop will likely see extreme fire behavior. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
